headline: ezCater Appoints Shaila Parikh as Chief Operations Officer
summary: BOSTON, February 04, 2026--ezCater, the #1 food tech platform for workplaces in the US, today announced the appointment of Shaila Parikh as its new Chief Operations Officer (COO). Parikh brings more than 20 years of experience in operations, strategy, and consulting at high-growth companies to ezCater. As COO, she will lead ezCater's customer care and supply chain operations to serve the company’s enterprise customers and restaurant partners nationwide.

content.title: ezCater Appoints Shaila Parikh as Chief Operations Officer

thumbnail.caption: ezCater, the #1 food tech platform for workplaces in the US, announced today that Shaila Parikh has joined the company as Chief Operations Officer, effective February 4, 2026.
